text:
Resizing updates only certain parts of the interface. Moving a window over
JMeter hides everything, but top menus are still active. When top menus are
clicked, they appear properly, while almost everything is still all gray. One
example of visual element that updates itself is the the aggregate report's list
of URLs.

JMeter 1.8
creator: nicolas@marchildon.net
nicolas@marchildon.net
text:

This looks like two different issues. The second one probably stems from a race
condition in the StatTableModel which I solved a while ago (when I added the
"TOTALS" row).

I just can't reproduce the 1st one (apparently about Paint events not being
handled). Was this happening when the workstation was heavily loaded?
creator: jsalvata@atg.com

text:
Been a fortnight nice I said I can't reproduce and asked for details.

Closing.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
